title: Select Collection of Valuable and Curious Arts and Interesting Experiments
description: This collection of projects and experiments was submitted by Rufus Tuttle, following an Act of Congress promoting education and learning. The projects were designed to be entertaining and educational, at a relatively low cost. - Summary by Lynne T
